turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm stuck in Petaluma, and I was hoping you could help me get a cup of coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. which starbucks did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to I wanted to get it from the one on Petaluma Boulevard.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a iced juniper latte, and I just need a a grande, and I want it with 2% milk, and make sure that Make sure that they put the extra pine citrus sugar on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or actually, do they have whole milk? If they have whole milk, I'll take whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's an iced juniper latte with extra pine citrus sugar, size grande with whole milk from the starbucks on Petaluma Blvd. in petaluma.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the receipt via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hope you enjoy, have a good day.
